name: Gir
description: The Gir is a famous Indian dairy cattle breed. It is well known for its milk production and its distinctive appearance, including a rounded and domed forehead, long pendulous ears, and horns that spiral out and back.
origin: Gir Hills and Kathiawar forests of Gujarat, India

name: Sahiwal
description: The Sahiwal is one of the best dairy breeds of zebu cattle. It is native to the Sahiwal district of Punjab province in Pakistan, and is also found in large numbers in India.

name: Red Sindhi
description: The Red Sindhi is a popular breed of dairy cattle originating from the Sindh province of Pakistan. They are known for their distinctive red color and excellent milk-producing capabilities.

name: Murrah Buffalo
description: The Murrah buffalo is a breed of domestic water buffalo originating in Punjab and Haryana states of India. They are known for their high milk production and are often referred to as 'black gold'.

name: Jafarabadi Buffalo
description: The Jafarabadi buffalo is a heavy breed of water buffalo found in Gujarat, India. They are known for their massive body, heavy horns, and good milk production.
